attributes.action: Tax petrol at the pump and abolish the road fund licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why isn't petrol taxed at the pump so you pay more if you drive more, and pay less if you drive less?  Or is that too much like common sense?  No need for the Road Fund Licence then surely?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
